name: detox
description: Detox - A cross-platform library for Haxe to make working with Xml and the DOM easy... similar to jQuery and friends, but works wherever Haxe works, in a more haxe-like way.
releasenote: Fix support for Haxe 3.0.1 (Use Context.error as fallback when Context.fatalError not available).  Fixed numerous widget bugs, mostly to do with initialization order, null-checking and parsing variables to partials.
